bhalisa: Incinci, indawo yenkumbulo ekhawulezayo ngaphakathi kweCPU
funda inkumbulo kuphela: Igcina imiyalelo ebalulekileyo ukuze ikhompyutha iqalise
imemori ye-cache: Incinci, inkumbulo ekhawulezayo ekufutshane ne-CPU yokufikelela ngokukhawuleza
ubungakanani begama: Inani leebhithi i-CPU enokuqhubekeka nayo kanye
umbhobho: Ubuchwephesha apho i-CPU isaphula imiyalelo ngokwezigaba ukuze isebenze kwezininzi ngaxeshanye
ukwenza izinto ezininzi: Ukusebenzisa ii-CPU ezininzi okanye ii-cores ukwenza imisebenzi ngaxeshanye
phazamisa: Uphawu olumisa okwethutyana i-CPU ukusingatha umcimbi
inkumbulo ebonakalayo: Ubuchwephesha bokusebenzisa isithuba sediski enzima njengokwandiswa kwe-RAM
bios: I-Basic Input / Output System, i-firmware eqalisa i-hardware ekuqaleni
i/o izibuko: Idilesi ethile kwikhompyuter yokunxibelelana nezixhobo zeperipheral
umqhubi wesixhobo: Isoftware evumela inkqubo yokusebenza ukulawula isixhobo
iprotocol yenethiwekhi: Iseti yemigaqo kunye nemigangatho yonxibelelwano phakathi kwezixhobo
umzila: Isixhobo esithumela iipakethi phambili phakathi kweenethiwekhi ezahlukeneyo
imaski ye-subnet: Isetyenziselwa ukumisela uthungelwano kunye neenxalenye zenginginya yedilesi ye-IP
imodeli yomncedisi womxhasi: Uyilo lwenethiwekhi apho abathengi bacela izibonelelo kwiiseva
dma: Ukufikelela ngokuthe ngqo kwimemori, kuvumela izixhobo ukuba zidlulise idatha ngaphandle kokusebenzisa i-CPU
